info.description: API for managing releases and deployments in the Catalyst Foundry system.
info.title: Catalyst Foundry API

get.description: Returns the public JSON Web Key Set used to verify access tokens

post.description: Create a new challenge for user authentication using Ed25519 keys

get.summary: Get GHA authentication configuration by ID

delete.description: Delete a GitHub Actions authentication configuration

post.description: Create an invite for a user with one or more roles; optionally emails a verification link

get.description: Retrieve all keys for a specific user

delete.description: Delete a user key by their ID

post.description: Revoke a user key by setting its status to revoked
Authenticate a user using their signed challenge response

get.description: Get all user keys with inactive status
Get a list of all users with pending status

get.description: Retrieve a list of all roles

parameters.description: If true, ignore permissions and add all permissions
parameters.name: admin

Retrieve a role by their ID

post.summary: Assign a user to a role

delete.description: Remove a user from a specific role
delete.summary: Remove a user from a role

get.description: Get a list of all users in the system

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a user by their email address

post.description: Register a new user with pending status

get.description: Retrieve a user by their ID

delete.description: Delete a user by their ID

post.description: Activate a user by setting their status to active
Deactivate a user by setting their status to inactive
Signs a server CSR using the Step-CA servers provisioner

get.description: Returns the Certificate Authority's root certificate

post.description: Signs a Certificate Signing Request (CSR) using step-ca
Approve a pending device session identified by user_code
Initialize a device authorization session and return device_code and user_code
Poll the device authorization session for completion and receive tokens when approved

get.description: Check the health status of the API service

Get all events for a deployment

get.description: Get all deployments for a release
Get all releases, optionally filtered by project

post.description: Rotate the refresh token and return a new access token and refresh token
Revoke a refresh token and any linked chain

get.description: Verify an invite token and activate the user; assigns roles from the invite

common_name.description: CommonName can override the CN in the CSR

csr.description: CSR is the PEM-encoded Certificate Signing Request

sans.description:
SANs are additional Subject Alternative Names to include
These will be validated against user permissions. For client certs, use URI SANs.

ttl.description:
TTL is the requested certificate lifetime
Will be capped by server policy

certificate.description: Certificate is the PEM-encoded signed certificate

certificate_chain.description: CertificateChain includes intermediate certificates if available

fingerprint.description: Fingerprint is the SHA256 fingerprint of the certificate

not_after.description: NotAfter is when the certificate expires

not_before.description: NotBefore is when the certificate becomes valid

serial_number.description: SerialNumber is the certificate's serial number

internal_api_handlers_user.Role.description: Role represents a role in the system

internal_api_handlers_user.User.description: User represents a user in the system

internal_api_handlers_user.UserRole.description: UserRole represents a many-to-many relationship between users and roles

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
